about_the_game:
MARINES VS GOD is an asymmetrical multiplayer (4vs1) co-op third-person shooter mixed with elements of real-time strategy, where FOUR Marine Players team up against ONE God Player, who wields a build of 100 powerful magic spells to prevent them from completing the mission!

Deckbuilding - Сhoose 7 spells out of 100 available:

Summon walking zombie with melee attack
Summon galactic alien with laser gun
Anthem of extinction to damage all units
Unleash psi storm destruction
Create destructable rocks to block marine's way
Summon crawl demon swarm
Lockdown protocol that make a marine drop his weapons for 10 seconds
Use illusion of deceit
Cast fireball
Depth power to call creature of the night in broad daylight
Summon reactive poisonous dragon
Spawn fake supplies to trick marines
Summon damned monster with melee attack
Lethal horror effect
Spawn society breaker boss
Make spirits unleashed
Use colorful rainbow party skill to make marines dance for 5 seconds
Set a silica trap
Evolve into a new clandestine life form
Drop atomic bomb
Deep water trap to slow the movement of marine
Black and white flux blinding marine
Killing project that marks marine and make all enemies hunt him
Obscure vision due to the fog of war
Spawn sci-fi mech
Repair any mechs, vehicles and robots

...and many more crazy combat spells that increase the replay value!

Give your friends a real chaos and hell leaving no stone unturned!

    Game features:

  • FPS RTS Gameplay: each match, one player takes on the role of God, while the others become Marines.
  • In Classic Competitive Mode, the company sent you as space marines to an unfamiliar planet so you must complete the mission and escape the planet before the bomb explodes that leads to doom of the God.
  • God's goal: to destroy the Marines or prevent them from completing their mission. Marines can try to escape the planet but they can't escape from their sins...
  • Marine division: unfortunate space marines were called to arms to fight as a team shoulder to shoulder. Otherwise they will be destroyed, incinerated, eaten or just funny killed by god in this action-packed encounter. Forewarned is forearmed.
  • 1-8 Player CO-OP: play with friends or randoms for an unforgettable epic multiplayer experience. Will you become a predator or a victim when fear surrounds you? Make Gods remember they were all once human too.
  • Enjoy the futuristic low polygon cartoony graphics style that adds an immersive visual flair.
  • God game: unique asymmetric addictive gameplay with Player vs God mod where you coop with marines together or play as a villain protagonist.
  • Maps: City on Planet Earth, Last Year of Mars Empire, Winter Resistance, Space Secret Laboratory, Forest and Hills, Tropical Wonderland, The highest dune, West Hunt and much more.
  • PvP \ PvE modes: 1 god vs 4 marines, 1 god + 1 marine vs 4 marines, 1 god + 2 marines vs AI
  • Exploration: lore-rich mythology locations and hidden secrets.
  • Asymmetrical warfare online party game that challenges your strategic and tactical thinking and teamwork.
  • Choose your God: Zeus, Necromancer, Demonologist, Gin, King of Robots, Matriarch, Juggernaut or even Anar Dreams!
  • Choose your Marine: Soldier, Sniper, Medic or Engineer with character and gun customization.
  • Become the first mortal to end the age of Gods!
Inspired by games like Helldivers, GTFO, Content Warning and Kingmakers - Marines vs God promises to deliver an engaging playtime mix of team-based gameplay and fast-paced battle. Cooperate with friends or other players, join the fight, put your soul at stake and experience the power of natural selection in an epic battle with God!
detailed_description:
Add the game to your Wishlist to support the developers!

ㅤ

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: ntel® Core™ i5-2500 @3.3 GHz / AMD FX-8320 @3.5 GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 560 / AMD Radeon™ HD 6870 (1GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit and newer recommended
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670K @3.4 GHz / AMD FX-8350 @4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 780 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 @3.20GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 M370X (2GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Sierra 10.12.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 @4.00GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon™ R9 M395X (4GB VRAM)
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 MB available space

name: MARINES VS GOD

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti or AMD R9 380
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD RX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: MARINES VS GOD is an epic asymmetrical (4vs1) co-op game, where Four Marine Players play versus God Player who must destroy them with 100 powerful spells! Add to Wishlist so you don't miss it!
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Spanish - Latin America*, Traditional Chinese*, Simplified Chinese*, Korean*, Polish*, Russian*, Turkish*, Ukrainian*, Japanese*, Arabic, Bulgarian, Hungarian, Vietnamese, Greek, Danish, Indonesian, Dutch, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Thai, Finnish, Czech, Swedish, Hindi, Kazakh
*languages with full audio support
